page.title: 20ACKNOWLEDGEMENTS
page.content:
The{information}on the {preceeding pages}was{collected}by Jamie Boxall,{Jonathan Benson,}Paul Burrows,{Christopher Edwards,}Steven Webster,{Anna Bobbett,}Sarah Little and{Sarah Pattinson}who would like to {thank}the following{people}who{helped them: {Mrs.M.Allinson}for transport Mrs.G.Cartmell for{transport {Mr.J.Grisenthwaite}(Cumbria Record Office, Kendal) Rev.D.Hampson{(Vicar of Crosscrake) for{transport {Mrs.M.Knipe}for transport Mr.and Mrs.W.H.Robinson{(Holmescales) {Mr.R.B.Viney}(Old Hutton School)
{July 1985
